name: PillHero
description:
PillHero 

In a world where everything is a virus and bacteria. YOU, as the hero of PILLs, should destroy them all!!.

YOUR ONLY WIN CONDITION IS TO DESTROY THE MASSIVE BACTERIA AT THE END OF THE LEVEL, YOU KILL IT == YOU WIN!!

You are given only a single chance to destroy the big bacteria, you died = you lose!

CONTROL:

MoveWASDARROWAttackJSPACE

ENJOY THE GAME!!
